Camera as a plant marker: Write the name of each plant on the camera's label and stick it into the soil as a creative and eco-friendly way to label your plants.
Camera as a reading light: Attach a small LED light to the top of the camera and use it as a reading light for reading in the dark.
Camera as a pen holder: Hollow out the body of the camera and use it as a pen holder for your desk.
Camera as a bookmark: Attach a small magnet to the back of the camera and use it as a unique bookmark for your books.
Camera as a conversation starter: Attach a small sign to the camera that says "ask me about my camera" and use it as an icebreaker in social situations.
